html: "The Declaration of Independence says all men are created equal. It doesn't say unless you have a pre-existing condition." - Dr. Dawn Jones, Shenandoah Community Health Center
text: "The Declaration of Independence says all men are created equal. It doesn't say unless you have a pre-existing condition." - Dr. Dawn Jones, Shenandoah Community Health Center

html: "Senator - what you've described over the last hour is it doesn't have to be either or. It's not a sound economy with sick people or a healthy population but we're broke. We just need to use common sense to find solutions." - Pastor Joey Rainey, Covenant Church Shepherdstown
text: "Senator - what you've described over the last hour is it doesn't have to be either or. It's not a sound economy with sick people or a healthy population but we're broke. We just need to use common sense to find solutions." - Pastor Joey Rainey, Covenant Church Shepherdstown

html: "Everyone - whether they like it or not is going to be affected. The economic impact of a repeal will be felt in every aspect of our society. I've heard from over 8,000 West Virginians about the impact will have on their lives." - @Sen_JoeManchin
text: "Everyone - whether they like it or not is going to be affected. The economic impact of a repeal will be felt in every aspect of our society. I've heard from over 8,000 West Virginians about the impact will have on their lives." - @Sen_JoeManchin

html: "We all agree that the ACA needs to be tweaked. There is room for it to be improved and repaired." - @Sen_JoeManchin
text: "We all agree that the ACA needs to be tweaked. There is room for it to be improved and repaired." - @Sen_JoeManchin

html: "It's common sense. If you're sick, you go to the doctor. You don't go to the E.R. for a headache. But people need access to the doctor first." - George Blough, cancer survivor
text: "It's common sense. If you're sick, you go to the doctor. You don't go to the E.R. for a headache. But people need access to the doctor first." - George Blough, cancer survivor

html: "Unfunded care costs all of us. As a chaplain I get called to the E.R. often and many of the patients don't have money to pay those medical bills. Those costs get past on. The ACA isn't perfect, but it's the beginning." - Pastor Eddie Edmonds, Moler Ave. Church of the Brothren
text: "Unfunded care costs all of us. As a chaplain I get called to the E.R. often and many of the patients don't have money to pay those medical bills. Those costs get past on. The ACA isn't perfect, but it's the beginning." - Pastor Eddie Edmonds, Moler Ave. Church of the Brothren

html: "I have about 6 pre-existing conditions and without insurance I'd be in a jam. The Affordable Care Act has changed my life." - JoAnn, client at Shenandoah Community Health Center
text: "I have about 6 pre-existing conditions and without insurance I'd be in a jam. The Affordable Care Act has changed my life." - JoAnn, client at Shenandoah Community Health Center

html: "If those with substance abuse disorder are cut off from healthcare access, we will see the opioid epidemic in West Virginia get exponentially worse. People need ongoing access to healthcare because recovery is an ongoing process." - Dave Didden, Jefferson Co. Health Dept.
text: "If those with substance abuse disorder are cut off from healthcare access, we will see the opioid epidemic in West Virginia get exponentially worse. People need ongoing access to healthcare because recovery is an ongoing process." - Dave Didden, Jefferson Co. Health Dept.

html: "I've worked with low income populations for years. The ramifications of not having healthcare are wide. They can't work, they can't get housing because they are bankrupt from their medical bills. It affects every access of their life." Michelle Goldman, nurse at free clinic
text: "I've worked with low income populations for years. The ramifications of not having healthcare are wide. They can't work, they can't get housing because they are bankrupt from their medical bills. It affects every access of their life." Michelle Goldman, nurse at free clinic

html: "I can't believe people are so set on repealing this access without a replacement plan in place. We can't go back to a time when one illness could mean financial ruin for a family in West Virginia." - @Sen_JoeManchin
text: "I can't believe people are so set on repealing this access without a replacement plan in place. We can't go back to a time when one illness could mean financial ruin for a family in West Virginia." - @Sen_JoeManchin

html: "But for the first time we have people getting treatment for mental illness or substance abuse when they never had it before. People who never had access to health insurance have it now. But we never taught anyone how to use this new access." - @Sen_JoeManchin
text: "But for the first time we have people getting treatment for mental illness or substance abuse when they never had it before. People who never had access to health insurance have it now. But we never taught anyone how to use this new access." - @Sen_JoeManchin

html: "Do I think the Affordable Care Act is everything it should be? No. And I have said that. If I had been there in 2009, I would have fought for a better product mix." - @Sen_JoeManchin

html: I have never and will never immediately oppose or support a Supreme Court nominee to score cheap political points or advance my own career. I have and will continue to give every nominee — whether Democrat or Republican — a fair and thorough examination.
text: I have never and will never immediately oppose or support a Supreme Court nominee to score cheap political points or advance my own career. I have and will continue to give every nominee — whether Democrat or Republican — a fair and thorough examination.

html: To my fellow West Virginians, As your Senator, I hold few responsibilities or obligations more sacred than my constitutional duty to advise and consent on every Presidential nominee to serve on the Supreme Court.
text:
To my fellow West Virginians, 

As your Senator, I hold few responsibilities or obligations more sacred than my constitutional duty to advise and consent on every Presidential nominee to serve on the Supreme Court.

html: I’ll continue fighting side by side with Republicans and Democrats to ensure every WVian has access to the quality healthcare they deserve.

html: For a lot of WVians with pre-existing conditions, insurance coverage is the difference between life & death, & I will do everything I can to protect them. #WV
text: For a lot of WVians with pre-existing conditions, insurance coverage is the difference between life & death, & I will do everything I can to protect them. #WV

html: WVians with cancer, heart disease, diabetes, arthritis, asthma, women who are pregnant, & many other illnesses & conditions, will be directly affected. We cannot go back to a time when insurance companies played God & allow them to decide who will be insured & who will not. #WV

html: We must secure our border and make sure that dangerous criminals cannot enter this country and that people coming into our country are doing so legally.
text: We must secure our border and make sure that dangerous criminals cannot enter this country and that people coming into our country are doing so legally.

html: We need more border patrol agents, drones, towers, ground sensors, thermal imaging, and Blackhawk helicopters at the border to ensure there is complete surveillance.
text: We need more border patrol agents, drones, towers, ground sensors, thermal imaging, and Blackhawk helicopters at the border to ensure there is complete surveillance.

html: I also believe we need additional border security measures to properly strengthen our border and protect our country. In 2013, I voted for a bill that included these additional measures.
text: I also believe we need additional border security measures to properly strengthen our border and protect our country. In 2013, I voted for a bill that included these additional measures.

html: Today I voted for $1.6 billion for a border wall out of the Homeland Security Appropriations Subcommittee today. I voted to pass funding for the border wall because we have to secure our borders.
text: Today I voted for $1.6 billion for a border wall out of the Homeland Security Appropriations Subcommittee today. I voted to pass funding for the border wall because we have to secure our borders.

html: Today, I am calling on my colleagues on both sides of the aisle to put partisan politics aside & come together to negotiate a responsible, balanced bipartisan solution that codifies strong #NetNeutrality protections & finally resolves this debate.
text: Today, I am calling on my colleagues on both sides of the aisle to put partisan politics aside & come together to negotiate a responsible, balanced bipartisan solution that codifies strong #NetNeutrality protections & finally resolves this debate.

html: It’s also why I strongly opposed the @FCC’s decision to repeal basic #NetNeutrality protections & cosponsored the bill to keep them in place that passed that Senate with bipartisan support last month.
text: It’s also why I strongly opposed the @FCC’s decision to repeal basic #NetNeutrality protections & cosponsored the bill to keep them in place that passed that Senate with bipartisan support last month.

html: It’s why WVians have told me that they want an internet that is free of content-based discrimination & support increased reliable, affordable internet access throughout our state.

html: Can you hear me now? In too many places in rural America this question gets asked every day when wireless calls get dropped and where service does not exist. text:
Can you hear me now? 

In too many places in rural America this question gets asked every day when wireless calls get dropped and where service does not exist.

html: I urge the Senate Republican leadership to stop playing games and send our kids back to school.
text: I urge the Senate Republican leadership to stop playing games and send our kids back to school.

html: Sadly, just like in Washington, it looks like political gamesmanship is winning the day & preventing a bipartisan compromise led by the Governor to help our educators & public employees, fix our PEIA system & get students learning again from becoming law.
text: Sadly, just like in Washington, it looks like political gamesmanship is winning the day & preventing a bipartisan compromise led by the Governor to help our educators & public employees, fix our PEIA system & get students learning again from becoming law.

html: But for some reason, Senate Republicans are choosing to keep our schools closed & kids at home over one percent. #WV families deserve better. When I visited with educators two weeks ago at the state capitol, they told me they want to be back in their classrooms.
text: But for some reason, Senate Republicans are choosing to keep our schools closed & kids at home over one percent. #WV families deserve better. When I visited with educators two weeks ago at the state capitol, they told me they want to be back in their classrooms.

html: It's time to get our kids back to school, & the only group standing in the way is Senate Republicans. Everyone else agrees on the deal to reopen our schools - a bipartisan coalition of educators, parents, Democrat & Republican Legislators, & the Governor.
text: It's time to get our kids back to school, & the only group standing in the way is Senate Republicans. Everyone else agrees on the deal to reopen our schools - a bipartisan coalition of educators, parents, Democrat & Republican Legislators, & the Governor.

html: We must come together to do our job, & find a solution to reopen the government as soon as possible. I will work around the clock in order to get that done.
text: We must come together to do our job, & find a solution to reopen the government as soon as possible. I will work around the clock in order to get that done.

html: Funding the government is one of our most basic constitutional obligations & now because of partisan politics, the government will shut down. Governing this way is dangerous to our national security and embarrassing for both political parties.
text: Funding the government is one of our most basic constitutional obligations & now because of partisan politics, the government will shut down. Governing this way is dangerous to our national security and embarrassing for both political parties.

West Virginia Democratic Senator Joe Manchin introduced legislation today that would withhold pay from members of Congress if they are unable to prevent a government shutdown. 

What do you think of this proposal?http://www.wvnstv.com/politics/sen-manchin-introduces-bill-to-withhold-congress-pay-in-event-of-government-shutdown/926649255 …

html: Governing this way is dangerous to our national security & embarrassing for both political parties. I urge my colleagues to come together, do our job, & find a solution that keeps our government running. I’m prepared to stay here as long as it takes to get that done.
text: Governing this way is dangerous to our national security & embarrassing for both political parties. I urge my colleagues to come together, do our job, & find a solution that keeps our government running. I’m prepared to stay here as long as it takes to get that done.

html: Funding the government is one of our most basic constitutional obligations. We cannot keep kicking the can down the road just to face the same problems a month later.
text: Funding the government is one of our most basic constitutional obligations. We cannot keep kicking the can down the road just to face the same problems a month later.

html: We have important work to do including ensuring our military is equipped to protect our country, fighting the opioid epidemic, keeping our promise to miners so they don’t lose their pensions, funding #CHIP & CHC's, expanding broadband access & passing an infrastructure package.
text: We have important work to do including ensuring our military is equipped to protect our country, fighting the opioid epidemic, keeping our promise to miners so they don’t lose their pensions, funding #CHIP & CHC's, expanding broadband access & passing an infrastructure package.

html: We are already more than 3 months in to FY 2018 & we still don’t have a plan to fund our government. Every time we pass short-term funding, we put our national security at risk, we stall critical projects & throw our economy & our citizens into limb.
text: We are already more than 3 months in to FY 2018 & we still don’t have a plan to fund our government. Every time we pass short-term funding, we put our national security at risk, we stall critical projects & throw our economy & our citizens into limb.

html: Today, I will vote to keep the government open for a fourth time for FY2018 through a continuing resolution. Just because I will vote to pass this doesn’t mean I like it.
text: Today, I will vote to keep the government open for a fourth time for FY2018 through a continuing resolution. Just because I will vote to pass this doesn’t mean I like it.

html: I have never & will never vote to shutdown the government.
text: I have never & will never vote to shutdown the government.

html: By now we should know this problem isn't going away. I'm not going to sit idly by while millions of Americans continue to die. As a nation, we cannot accept this anymore.
text: By now we should know this problem isn't going away. I'm not going to sit idly by while millions of Americans continue to die. As a nation, we cannot accept this anymore.

html: We need to commit to passing my legislation, the LifeBOAT Act, which would creating a permanent funding stream by placing a one cent fee on every milligram of opioid produced. This would bring in about $2 billion a year.http://bit.ly/2CSvdx0
text: We need to commit to passing my legislation, the LifeBOAT Act, which would creating a permanent funding stream by placing a one cent fee on every milligram of opioid produced. This would bring in about $2 billion a year.http://bit.ly/2CSvdx0

html: If we are serious about fixing this problem, we need targeted emergency funding to save lives now & permanent funding for treatment centers that can save lives tomorrow.
text: If we are serious about fixing this problem, we need targeted emergency funding to save lives now & permanent funding for treatment centers that can save lives tomorrow.

html: For too long, we have focused on Band-Aid solutions as this crisis has compounded into too many societal issues to count.
text: For too long, we have focused on Band-Aid solutions as this crisis has compounded into too many societal issues to count.

html: But despite the impacts we continue to do far too little to stop it. What we are doing is not working. It is clear we must double, triple or quadruple our efforts.
text: But despite the impacts we continue to do far too little to stop it. What we are doing is not working. It is clear we must double, triple or quadruple our efforts.

html: We all know about the trauma our neighbors, families & friends have endured as a result of this epidemic. We know about the strain it has put on our communities.
text: We all know about the trauma our neighbors, families & friends have endured as a result of this epidemic. We know about the strain it has put on our communities.

html: Despite my best efforts to work with Congressional leadership & 2 administrations for nearly a decade, our country still cannot properly combat an epidemic that is ravaging our nation & that will change every aspect of our society for generations to come.
text: Despite my best efforts to work with Congressional leadership & 2 administrations for nearly a decade, our country still cannot properly combat an epidemic that is ravaging our nation & that will change every aspect of our society for generations to come.

html: That is a 28% increase from 2015. That is 115 people dying every single day.
text: That is a 28% increase from 2015. That is 115 people dying every single day.
